nodes.text: A human female pilot served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire. In 2 BBY, she served in Green Squadron at the Battle of Atollon where she flew a Y-wing and made bombing runs on one of Grand Admiral Thrawn's Star Destroyers. On the second pass, she was killed by TIE fighters protecting the Star Destroyer.
This pilot wore an orange flight suit and a helmet with a gold visor.
This character appeared in "Zero Hour", in which her voice was provided by Mary Elizabeth McGlynn. She was identified as "Rebel Pilot #1" in the episode's credits.
